title: Aromatics | Reliance Industries Limited
description: Aromatics is one of the major product lines of RIL’s Petrochemicals Sector. Aromatics are cyclic unsaturated hydrocarbons containing one or more Benzene rings.
keywords: Aromatics, Paraxylene, Ortho Xylene, Benzene, Linear Alkyl Benzen, relmedlab

og:description: Reliance Industries Limited is committed to innovation-led, exponential growth in the areas of hydrocarbon exploration and production, petroleum refining and marketing, petrochemicals, retail and telecommunications.
